channel.title: Few Questions
channel.description:
well,
whats is the best client for a runescape private server......but how would i make it so the players dont need to enter a ip and port.
also what is the best server with most working npcs

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @ballwinkle ballwinkle
item.description:
@ballwinkle wrote:

is this somthing to do with it?
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffFF, "Username: " + aString1173 + ((anInt1216 == 0) & (anInt1161 % 40 < 20) ? “@xxx@|” : “”), j);
j += 15;
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xffffff, "Password: " + Class50.method588(aString1174, 0) + ((anInt1216 == 1) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? “|” : “”), j);
j += 15;
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Server IP: " + server + ((anInt1216 == 2) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? “@xxx@|” : “”), j);
j += 15;
aClass30_Sub2_Sub1_Sub4_1272.method389(false, true, c / 2 - 90, 0xfff00, "@whi@Port: " + port + ((anInt1216 == 3) & (anInt1105 % 40 < 20) ? “@xxx@|” : “”), j);

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @hippyss hippyss
item.description:
@hippyss wrote:

Ever heard of a String? in most clients theres a String called server just edit that String to match your server’s ip then remove the edit the ip field on the client.

item.title: Few Questions
item.dc:creator: @hallowed_soul hallowed soul
item.description:
@hallowed_soul wrote:

1.) best client. A.) silabs. webclient at http://client.silabsoft.org (it isnt up right now)

  1. not entering an ip and port. A.) you have to! unless its a client that only connects to a certain ip/port.

3.) there are many sources, just look around the downloads section
